ygData.subject: Re: Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)
ygData.msgSnippet: I went to CB for the first time last night and I was really surprised at how easy it was to get both a Shiny Brass Shield, and the Dragoon Dirk.  I picked up
ygData.messageBody:
I went to CB for the first time last night and I was really surprised at how
easy it was to get both a Shiny Brass Shield, and the Dragoon Dirk. I
picked up two shields while killing only 3 trainers, and as everyone knows,
Dvinn always has the dirk. In fact, I saw people selling them for 30pp
which is an amazingly low price for a weapon of that quality. In fact,
though my piercing is currently at 0, the weapon is so good, I'm going to
drop some of my many saved training points in piercing and switch weapons.

Laena of the Amber Order
15th Lvl Bard
